memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to protect the town."
Diana: "Charlie, what's your basis for accusing Bob? We should discuss this carefully."
You: "Charlie, do you have any evidence for your claim? Accusing without proof could be dangerous for the town."
Diana: "Charlie, without evidence, your accusation is risky. Maybe we should vote for you if you can't back it up."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed his role. Trust me, voting him out is the only way to keep the town safe."
You: "Charlie, your story doesn't add up. If you're the detective, why no details? You're just trying to frame me—vote for Charlie instead!"
